segments.text: From my angle, I see a complete disregard for the chaos at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her mundane task; it’s almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, with water flooding the floor, I feel a rising frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems as if she’s choosing to ignore the obvious disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t quite understand how one can be so oblivious in the face of impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy up on that rickety stool makes my heart race a little faster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so expectant, her hand raised to receive the cookies—it’s sweet, yet troubling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene presents a clash between innocence and negligence, and it’s unnerving.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just nudge that woman, make her see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
